name: farmhouse dishtowels
notes:
materials

- main color: 1 skein of purl soho’s [cotton pure][1], 100% organically grown cotton. each skein is 279 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 274 yards required.
- contrast color: 1 skein of purl soho’s cotton pure; approximately 22 yards required.
- us 4 (3.5 mm), 24-inch [circular needles][2]

we knit up our dishtowels in these pretty palettes (note: some colors may no longer be available)...

- mc: heirloom white + cc: tomato orange
- mc: heirloom white + cc: linden green
- mc: heirloom white + cc: crystal blue

gauge
31 stitches and 44 rows = 4 inches in stitch pattern

size
finished dimensions: 11 inches wide x 17¼ inches long


designed for purl soho by [jake canton][3].


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/cotton-pure.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet.html?collection_filter=23796
  [3]: http://www.jakecanton.com
